meanings.definition: An individual having two identical alleles of a particular gene.
meanings.sent1: The homozygote inherited the same gene from both parents.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the homozygote to understand genetic traits.
meanings.sent3: The homozygote gene party was a hit with all the alleles dancing together.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of genetics, the homozygote stood out like a flower with matching petals.
meanings.sent5: The homozygote was like a genetic mirror reflecting the same allele twice.

meanings.sent1: The homozygote displayed consistent traits due to its genetic makeup.
meanings.sent2: Farmers often breed homozygotes to maintain specific characteristics in crops.
meanings.sent3: At the genetic party, the homozygote was the one wearing the matching outfit.
meanings.sent4: The field of homozygotes looked like a sea of identical organisms.
meanings.sent5: The homozygote organism was like a twin with the same genetic code.
